column1: #text=Springtime is upon us and there 's no better time to get outdoors and work on landscaping .
#text=An easy way to improve your yard is to plant a tree .
#text=Head on over to your local home and garden store and pick out an appropriate tree .
#text=If you do n't have one already , pickup a shovel as well .
#text=Head out to your yard and carefully scope out a great spot to plant the tree .
#text=If you have any questions about digging , make sure to contact your local government authority to make sure there are no pipes underground !
#text=Once you have a safe spot , dig a whole large enough to fit the tree that your purchased and make sure to save the dirt .
#text=After you plant the tree in the ground , make sure to fill in this hole and pack it tight .
#text=If it 's been dry in your area make sure to water the tree in order to help it grow .
#text=Enjoy the reduction in your carbon footprint !
